name: Anti-Race
description:
Made with Godot. Stop your ship when you see it moving. The first one to reach the finish line loses. 

Only the windows download has been tested.

CONTROLS:

Player 1: SPACE to stop.

Player 2: ENTER to stop.

CREDITS:

Motor sfx: https://freesound.org/people/Daveshu88/sounds/325845/

Menu sfx: https://freesound.org/people/Nightflame/sounds/397599/

Countdown sfx: https://freesound.org/people/sonically_sound/sounds/612873/

music:
